modName: VS TW3 Anna Henrietta Riding Outfit
summary: Anna Henrietta's "Riding Outfit" from CD Projekt Red's the Witcher 3: Blood and Wine DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#ffff00][size=5]MAY NOT BE UPLOADED TO ANY OTHER SITE FOR REDISTRIBUTION OR ALTERATIONS.
NO EXCEPTIONS.
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][b][u][size=5]USED BY PERMISSION OF CDPR FOR USE ON NEXUS ONLY!!![/size]
[/u][/b][/color][/size]



[size=3]UNP Skyrim conversion of CD Projekt Red's the Witcher 3, Anna Henrietta's "Riding Outfit" (Duchess) from Blood and Wine DLC.
Set includes 3 pieces: Outfit, Boots and Satchel.

Weight slider is coming. Right now this is set for just the lowest body weight. I updated to the newest bodyslide and the laptop I work from is not compatible. So I am working on, well a work around that will hopefully be out if not before Christmas than shortly after. Currently there is a dummy slider in place to keep the armor mesh from exploding on body weights larger than lowest setting. Bear with me while I get the issue resolved.

CBBE bodyslide will most likely follow after the weight slider is finished.



All pieces are craftable at forge, under leather. No perks required.
Or Console search under "Riding Outfit," "Riding Boots" and "Riding Satchel"



[color=#ffff00][size=4]ENB USERS:[/size][/color]
My mods use cubemaps and speculars.
Not all ENBs handle cubemaps and speculars well.
Some ENBs will wash out a mesh with cubemaps and speculars.

If the textures are:
faded, shiny or glowing in your game,
or details seem to be lost,
if it looks anything perverse from my provided screenshots --------> it is your ENB.
Consult your ENB's mod page for a fix.
Screenshots take with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB[/url].


[size=4][size=5][color=#ffff00]SSE version is not coming for awhile. [/color][/size][color=#ffff00]
Please no requests for SSE. It will come eventually.[/color][/size]
[/size]



[size=3][color=#3c78d8][size=5]INSTALL[/size][/color]
NMM, MO, or manual. Your choice.
[size=5]
[color=#3c78d8]
REQUIREMENTS[/color][/size]
Skyrim original release.
[size=5][/size]

CDPR for their exclusive permissions to use Witcher 1, 2 and 3 assets.

ViciousSARR UNP Skyrim Conversion.
[/size][size=3]



[size=3][color=#3c78d8][size=5]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]
Translations welcome. Please contact me first.[/size][/size][/center][size=3]
[/size]
[size=3]
[/size]
